text:
The combination of trazodone with birth control medications may increase the

risk of adverse effects such as changes in menstrual cycle, mood changes, and

increased risk of blood clots.

While the previous section discussed interactions between antipsychotics and

birth control, this section will explore interactions between trazodone and

birth control. The combination of trazodone with birth control medications

may increase the risk of adverse effects such as changes in menstrual cycle,
